description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow change design to one front elevation ground floor window in relation to planning permission reference  221185FUL dated 12/05/2022 for 'Replacement existing all timber single glazed sash windows and all side and rear elevation timber doors/doorset with UPVC double glazed windows and doors/doorset; and replacement of timber fascia's, soffit's and bargeboard's with UPVC'.
decision_conditions: The proposed amendment cannot be accepted as a non-material amendment to planning permission 221185FUL dated 12/05/2022 in accordance with 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for non-material amendments following grant of planning permission 2011.
